Wolfblade::

She smiled at him."I love you too much. You asked me to stay, and I
did."  She moved to walk closer to him, so she could lean her head on
his shoulder as they walked. Not exactly a practical form of
locomotion, but a romantic one none the less. She let a dreamy sigh
escape as she walked with him.  




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The smile on his faceplates grew as she held his hand.
>  
> "A clearing not too far from here, within sensor range of base."
>  
> They walked a bit more, then he turned to Wolfblade with a sincere look.
>  
> "Thank you for staying with me."
